column5: Was wondering if anyone knew of a Childrens Charity or other that would take used rods, reels and tackle? I would like to donate some stuff after cleaning out the boathouse. I have 5 complete rod/reel outfits, 5 reels and 2 full tackle boxes.  I would like it to be a charity that helps kids learn to and get involved with fishing.  Contact info appreciated.  Dirk
Very kind of you!  PM Tybo....he might be able to steer you straight.
good on ya Dirk! one I can think of close to home is The Childrenâ€™s Wish Foundation @ 725 Westney Road South, Unit 7, Ajax, ON L1S 7J7
Give Big Brothers and Sisters a call, I'm sure they could use it.
OFAH has there traveling tackle van & some area libraries have a tackle loaning set up, I have a 4-H Fishing club with members that would use it if you don't find any where else Richard

I have donated a fair bit of stuff to the OPP. They have a great Cops & Kids fishing program and always need fishing stuff. Another option would be Cottage dreams. It is a charity that donates stays at cottages to folks recovering from cancer. A couple of rods and some plastic grubs always make a kids stay at the cottage more fun.
